Title: Initial PQC Planning Guide
Description: ASD publishes initial Planning for Post-Quantum Cryptography guidance.

Title: ISM December 2024 Update
Description: ASD updates ISM with specific PQC requirements including ML-DSA-87, ML-KEM-1024, SHA-384/512, AES-256 by 2030.

Title: Migration Planning Phase
Description: Organizations develop refined PQC transition plan accounting for security goals, risk tolerances, and data value.

Title: PQC Planning Guide Updated
Description: ASD publishes updated Planning for PQC guidance with LATICE framework and detailed milestones.

Title: Critical Systems Migration Start
Description: Implementation of PQC algorithms begins with most critical and sensitive systems.

Title: Full Migration Phase
Description: Complete transition to ASD-approved PQC algorithms across all systems.

Title: Traditional Crypto Prohibited
Description: Cease use of traditional asymmetric cryptography (RSA, ECDSA, ECDH). Full transition to PQC complete.

Title: PQC Best Practices Published
Description: CFDIR publishes Canadian National Quantum-Readiness Best Practices and Guidelines.

Title: PQC Migration Roadmap Published
Description: CCCS publishes ITSM.40.001 Roadmap for migration to PQC for Government of Canada.

Title: SPIN Notice Published
Description: Security Policy Implementation Notice on PQC migration effective October 9, 2025 under Policy on Government Security.

Title: Departmental Planning Phase
Description: Federal departments develop initial departmental PQC migration plans. Due by April 2026.

Title: Contract PQC Clauses Required
Description: All new Government of Canada contracts must include PQC capability clauses by April 1, 2026.

Title: High Priority Migration Phase
Description: Migration of high priority government systems. Annual progress reporting required.

Title: High Priority Systems Complete
Description: Completion of PQC migration for high priority government systems.

Title: Remaining Systems Migration
Description: Migration of all remaining non-classified government systems.

Title: Full GC Migration Complete
Description: Completion of PQC migration for all Government of Canada non-classified systems.

Title: CACR PQC Competition Results
Description: CACR announces results of its post-quantum cryptography competition selecting initial algorithms.

Title: NGCC Program Launched
Description: China launches Next-Generation Commercial Cryptographic (NGCC) Algorithms Program for PQC standardization.

Title: NGCC Algorithm Evaluation
Description: NGCC program evaluates submitted algorithms for security, performance, and implementation feasibility.

Title: National PQC Standards Expected
Description: Expected release of Chinese national standards for post-quantum cryptography.

Title: Financial Sector Migration
Description: Mandated migration for critical financial infrastructure to quantum-safe cryptography.

OrgFullName: National Cyber and Information Security Agency
Title: Cryptographic Recommendations
Description: NUKIB publishes Minimum Requirements for cryptographic algorithms with PQC guidance.

OrgFullName: National Cyber and Information Security Agency
Title: Key Establishment Migration
Description: Migration for key establishment and encryption systems.

OrgFullName: National Cyber and Information Security Agency
Title: Encryption Migration Complete
Description: Complete migration by 2027 for key establishment and encryption. Firmware/software signing as soon as possible.

Title: EU PQC Recommendation Published
Description: European Commission publishes Recommendation (EU) 2024/1101 on Coordinated Implementation Roadmap for PQC transition.

Title: 21-Nation Joint Statement
Description: France, Germany, and Netherlands lead joint statement on PQC transition with 21 EU member state signatories.

Title: National Roadmap Development
Description: Member States develop initial national PQC transition roadmaps and start identification and awareness activities.

Title: EU PQC Roadmap Published
Description: NIS Cooperation Group publishes Coordinated Implementation Roadmap for PQC with specific milestones for all member states.

Title: Member State Pilots
Description: All EU member states conduct PQC pilot implementations and establish national strategies.

Title: High-Risk Systems Migration
Description: High-risk use cases, notably critical infrastructure and vital sectors, implement PQC.

Title: Critical Infrastructure PQC Complete
Description: High-risk use cases including critical infrastructure must be secured with PQC.

Title: Full Transition Phase
Description: Complete PQC transition for remaining systems across Europe.

Title: Full EU PQC Transition
Description: Complete PQC transition for as many systems as practically feasible across Europe.

Title: PQC Position Paper Published
Description: ANSSI releases initial position paper on post-quantum cryptography transition with three-phase roadmap.

Title: Phase 1 - Defense in Depth
Description: Hybridization provides optional post-quantum defense-in-depth while maintaining pre-quantum security assurance.

Title: PQC Follow-up Paper Published
Description: ANSSI releases follow-up position paper accelerating PQC timeline. Security visas for hybrid PQC expected 2024-2025.

Title: Security Visa Certification
Description: ANSSI security visa certification for hybrid PQC products begins. Required for Phase 2 compliance.

Title: PQC Preparedness Study Published
Description: ANSSI publishes study showing significant lack of PQC preparedness among French organizations.

Title: Phase 2 - Hybrid Security
Description: Hybridization provides post-quantum security assurance while avoiding pre-quantum security regression. Security visas available.

Title: Pre-Quantum Only Prohibited
Description: New products should avoid using only pre-quantum cryptography.

Title: Phase 3 - Standalone PQC
Description: Optional standalone post-quantum cryptography (without hybridization) becomes acceptable.

Title: G7 Statement on Quantum Computing
Description: G7 issues statement on planning for opportunities and risks of quantum computing for cybersecurity.

Title: Financial Sector Advisory
Description: G7 CEG advises financial authorities to assess quantum risks and develop migration plans highlighting harvest now decrypt later threat.

Title: TR-02102 PQC Update
Description: BSI updates Technical Guideline TR-02102-1 with PQC recommendations including ML-KEM, ML-DSA, SLH-DSA.

Title: EU Joint Statement on PQC
Description: BSI with 17 EU member states issues joint statement urging transition to PQC for most sensitive use cases by 2030.

Title: Crypto-Agility Implementation
Description: BSI with 21 EU member states issues joint statement urging transition to PQC for most sensitive use cases by 2030.

Title: PQC Pilot Implementations
Description: Pilot implementations of PQC in selected government sectors. PQC in Botan library available.

Title: TR-02102-1 January 2025 Update
Description: BSI updates Technical Guideline TR-02102-1 requiring hybrid-only PQC implementations. FrodoKEM and Classic McEliece recommended.

Title: Hybrid Implementation Phase
Description: Mandatory hybrid (classical+PQC) deployment for all systems handling sensitive data.

Title: Sensitive Use Cases Protected
Description: Most sensitive use cases should be protected against quantum attacks.

Title: Long-term Data Migration Complete
Description: Recommended completion of migration for data with long-term security needs.

Title: National Quantum Mission Launched
Description: India launches National Quantum Mission with ₹6,003 crore (~$720M) budget including PQC research through 2031.

Title: TEC PQC Migration Guidance
Description: Telecom Engineering Centre publishes PQC migration guidance for telecommunications sector.

Title: First Quantum-Secure Satellite
Description: Space TS and Synergy Quantum announce India first PQC-secured satellite demonstration.

Title: PQC Readiness Guide Published
Description: Organizational Cyber Readiness to the Post-Quantum Age guidance published.

Title: Banking PQC Requirements
Description: Requirement for financial services firms to manage quantum risk, develop cryptographic inventory and initial migration plan.

Title: BOI Directive 202501EN
Description: Bank of Israel Directive requiring banking institutions to manage quantum risk, develop cryptographic inventories.

Title: Government PQC Assessment Deadline
Description: Government ministries must complete quantum threat assessments and include PQC in new technology contracts.

OrgFullName: Israel National Cyber Directorate / Bank of Israel
Title: Inventory & Planning Phase
Description: Organizations create cryptographic inventory, add PQC to contracts, develop initial plans.

Title: PQC Guidance Published
Description: ACN publishes 'Crittografia Post-Quantum e Quantistica: Preparazione alla Minaccia Quantistica' guidance.

Title: Initial PQC Guidelines
Description: CRYPTREC publishes initial Cryptographic Technology Guideline for Post-Quantum Cryptography.

OrgFullName: New Energy and Industrial Technology Development Organization
Title: PQC Guidelines 2024 Edition (Published April 2025)
Description: NEDO K Program research on PQC implementation technologies. Final standardization documents due 2026.

OrgFullName: National center of Incident readiness and Strategy for Cybersecurity
Title: PQC Migration Planning
Description: Following NIST standardization, focusing on lattice-based and hash-based algorithms. CRYPTREC preparing detailed guidelines.

Title: PQC Guidelines 2024 Edition
Description: CRYPTREC publishes Post-Quantum Cryptography Technology Guideline 2024 edition (released March 2025).

OrgFullName: National center of Incident readiness and Strategy for Cybersecurity
Title: Critical Systems Migration
Description: Target for migrating critical government systems. Dual-track approach: PQC and QKD technologies.

Title: National PQC Readiness Roadmap
Description: Malaysia unveils National Post-Quantum Cryptography Readiness Roadmap as ASEAN leader.

Title: World Largest PQC Conference
Description: Malaysia hosts world largest PQC conference with 2,500 delegates in October 2025.

Title: National PQC Assessment
Description: Government agencies conduct cryptographic inventory and quantum risk assessment under national roadmap.

Title: Quantum Technologies Strategy
Description: NATO publishes first Quantum Technologies Strategy with five PQC-specific commitments.

Title: Transatlantic Quantum Community
Description: Deploy PQC and QKD through Transatlantic Quantum Community joint research and implementation.

Title: Classified Networks PQC
Description: Target for transitioning classified NATO networks to FIPS PQC algorithms.

OrgFullName: General Intelligence and Security Service / NCSC
Title: TLS Guidelines Published
Description: NCSC publishes Guidelines for Quantum-Safe Transport Layer Encryption.

Title: PQC Migration Handbook v1
Description: AIVD, CWI, and TNO publish first edition of PQC Migration Handbook.

OrgFullName: General Intelligence and Security Service / NCSC
Title: Quantum Secure Guide Published
Description: AIVD and NCSC publish 'Make your organization quantum secure' guidance for CIOs, CTOs, CISOs.

Title: PQC Migration Handbook v2
Description: AIVD, CWI, and TNO publish renewed PQC Migration Handbook (2nd edition) with updated guidance.

OrgFullName: General Intelligence and Security Service / NCSC
Title: Risk Analysis & Planning
Description: Organizations conduct risk analysis, map cryptographic assets, and prepare migration plan.

OrgFullName: General Intelligence and Security Service / NCSC
Title: PQC Migration Execution
Description: Execute migration paths to quantum-safe cryptography.

Title: Q-Day Window
Description: AIVD estimates quantum computers will break common cryptographic algorithms between 2030 and 2040.

Title: NZISM v3.8 Updated
Description: New Zealand Information Security Manual updated with PQC guidance.

Title: NZISM v3.9 Updated
Description: New Zealand Information Security Manual updated with PQC guidance including Section 2.4 on PQC preparation and Section 17.1.19 on quantum computing impacts.

Title: Transition Phase
Description: Transition to PQC begins from 2026-27.

Title: Initial PQC Guidance
Description: CSA issues initial guidance on quantum computing threats and PQC preparation.

Title: Financial Services PQC Requirements
Description: MAS requires financial services firms to prepare PQC transition plan.

Title: FSTI Quantum Track Announced
Description: MAS commits S$100 million for quantum and AI capabilities in financial sector through 2030.

OrgFullName: Cyber Security Agency / Monetary Authority of Singapore
Title: MAS Advisory MAS/TCRS/2024/01
Description: MAS Advisory requiring financial services firms to maintain cryptographic inventories, develop migration strategies, and work with vendors.

Title: CSA Quantum-Safe Handbook
Description: CSA publishes Quantum-Safe Handbook for public consultation with Quantum Readiness Index (QRI) self-assessment tool.

Title: Financial Sector Quantum Track
Description: Financial institutions implement quantum-safe solutions under FSTI Quantum Track program.

Title: KpqC Research Group Established
Description: NIS and NSR establish Korean Post-Quantum Cryptography (KpqC) research group.

OrgFullName: National Intelligence Service / Ministry of Science & ICT
Title: PQC Master Plan Published
Description: NIS and MSIT publish PQC Master Plan with six tracks for nationwide transformation.

Title: Action Plans Development
Description: Develop action plans for six tracks: technology, regulations, procedures, support systems, assurance, industry base.

Title: KpqC Winners Announced
Description: NIS announces final winners of KpqC competition: HAETAE, AIMer (signatures); SMAUG-T, NTRU+ (KEMs).

Title: Pilot Transition Phase
Description: Establishment of procedures and pilot transition for cryptography transformation. Supporting systems development.

Title: National Migration Phase
Description: Nationwide cryptography systems transformation to post-quantum cryptography.

Title: Full PQC Transition
Description: Complete nationwide cryptography systems transformation to post-quantum cryptography.

Title: Four-Phase PQC Approach
Description: CCN defines four-phase approach from today through post-2030. Recommends NIST algorithms and FrodoKEM.

Title: PQC Transition Period
Description: Four-phase approach implementation period.

Title: Quantum-Safe Action Plan
Description: Financial Innovation Desk publishes Action Plan to a Quantum-Safe Financial Future with 7-step framework.

Title: Financial Sector Planning
Description: Swiss financial institutions develop PQC transition strategies following FIND action plan.

Title: PQC White Paper Updated
Description: NCSC updates PQC White Paper to endorse NIST quantum-safe algorithms. First major jurisdiction to reflect NIST algorithms.

Title: White Paper v2.0 Published
Description: NCSC updates PQC White Paper to version 2.0 with ML-KEM-768 and ML-DSA-65 as baseline parameters.

Title: PQC Migration Roadmap Published
Description: NCSC publishes comprehensive three-phase PQC migration roadmap with specific milestones through 2035.

Title: Hardware HSM PQC Support Expected
Description: Advanced HSMs with PQC cryptographic roots of trust expected to become available.

Title: Discovery & Planning Phase
Description: Organizations complete full discovery of cryptographic services needing upgrades and draft migration plan.

Title: Priority Migration Phase
Description: Execute high-priority PQC upgrades, refine plans, and prepare infrastructure for full transition.

Title: Full Migration Phase
Description: Complete migration to PQC for all systems, services, and products.

Title: Full PQC Compliance
Description: Target for full compliance with PQC standards across all government and critical sectors.

Title: NIST IR 8547 Draft Transition Guidance
Description: NIST publishes draft guidance for transition to PQC standards. Classical asymmetric algorithms deprecated by 2030, disallowed by 2035.

Title: CNSA 2.0 Published
Description: NSA publishes Commercial National Security Algorithm Suite 2.0 with quantum-resistant algorithm requirements.

Title: OMB M-23-02 Published
Description: OMB memo requiring federal agencies to submit cryptographic system inventories and prioritized migration plans.

Title: Software/Firmware Signing Transition
Description: Begin transitioning immediately; support and prefer CNSA 2.0 by 2025 for software and firmware signing.

OrgFullName: National Institute of Standards and Technology / NSA
Title: Cryptographic Inventory
Description: Federal agencies perform comprehensive cryptographic inventory using ACDI tools per NSM-10.

OrgFullName: National Institute of Standards and Technology
Title: FIPS 203, 204, 205 Published
Description: NIST releases the first set of PQC standards for ML-KEM (FIPS 203), ML-DSA (FIPS 204), and SLH-DSA (FIPS 205).

OrgFullName: National Institute of Standards and Technology
Title: NIST IR 8547 Transition Guidance
Description: NIST publishes draft guidance for transition to PQC standards, outlining migration approach and timelines.

Title: Automated PQC Discovery Strategy
Description: CISA publishes Strategy for Migrating to Automated Post-Quantum Cryptography Discovery and Inventory Tools.

Title: PQC Report to Congress
Description: White House publishes July 2024 Report on Post-Quantum Cryptography outlining federal transition strategy.

Title: PQC Considerations for OT
Description: CISA publishes Post-Quantum Considerations for Operational Technology guidance.

Title: Web/Cloud Services Transition
Description: Support and prefer CNSA 2.0 by 2025 for web browsers/servers and cloud services.

Title: Traditional Networking Transition
Description: Support and prefer CNSA 2.0 by 2026 for traditional networking equipment (VPNs, routers).

OrgFullName: National Institute of Standards and Technology
Title: HQC Selected as Fifth Algorithm
Description: NIST selects HQC (Hamming Quasi-Cyclic) as backup KEM algorithm based on code-based cryptography.

Title: Operating Systems Transition
Description: Support and prefer CNSA 2.0 by 2027 for operating systems.

OrgFullName: NIST National Cybersecurity Center of Excellence
Title: PQC Interoperability Testing
Description: NCCoE performs interoperability testing of standardized PQC algorithms in common protocols.

Title: Large PKI Systems Migration
Description: Migration of large public key infrastructure systems to CNSA 2.0 algorithms.

OrgFullName: National Institute of Standards and Technology
Title: HQC Standard Finalized (Expected)
Description: Final standard incorporating HQC algorithm expected to be published.

Title: NSS Acquisitions CNSA 2.0 Required
Description: New National Security Systems acquisitions must be CNSA 2.0 compliant starting January 2027.

Title: 112-bit Security Deprecated
Description: Legacy algorithms offering less than 112-bit security (e.g., RSA-2048) deprecated.

Title: CNSA 2.0 Exclusive - Network/Signing
Description: Exclusively use CNSA 2.0 for software/firmware signing and traditional networking equipment.

Title: NSS Quantum Resistant Majority
Description: Vast majority of cryptography in National Security Systems should be quantum resistant.

Title: CNSA 2.0 Exclusive - OS/Web/Cloud
Description: Exclusively use CNSA 2.0 for web browsers/servers, cloud services, operating systems, and large PKI systems.

Title: Full CNSA 2.0 Transition Complete
Description: Complete transition to CNSA 2.0 algorithms for all National Security Systems (NSS).
